Material used.Description: Synaptosomes were prepared from α-syn KO mice cerebral cortices.

Readout description.Result Description: The A30P mutant showed significantly reduced binding to synaptic membranes compared to WT and A53T.
The A53T mutant showed increased binding to synaptic membranes.
The E46K mutant was not specifically mentioned in the results.

Biological replicates.Description: Multiple independent preparations of synaptosomes were used.

Technical replicates.Description: Each experiment was repeated multiple times with consistent results.

Basic positive control.Description: WT α-synuclein was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Synaptosomes from α-syn KO mice without added α-synuclein served as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA and Bonferroni's multiple comparison test were used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Binding levels similar to WT α-synuclein.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Significantly reduced binding compared to WT α-synuclein.

Material used.Description: Cytosol was prepared from mouse brains and dialyzed.

Readout description.Result Description: The A30P mutant showed significantly reduced binding to synaptic membranes compared to WT and A53T.
The A53T mutant showed increased binding to synaptic membranes.
The E46K mutant was not specifically mentioned in the results.

Biological replicates.Description: Multiple independent preparations of cytosol were used.

Technical replicates.Description: Each experiment was repeated multiple times with consistent results.

Basic positive control.Description: WT α-synuclein was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Cytosol from α-syn KO mice without added α-synuclein served as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA and Bonferroni's multiple comparison test were used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Binding levels similar to WT α-synuclein.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Significantly reduced binding compared to WT α-synuclein.
